mapper.select: select cafe_no, cafe_name, cafe_loc, cafe_pic, cafe_tel, pick_no, id, rnum from (select c.cafe_no, c.cafe_name, c.cafe_loc, c.cafe_pic, c.cafe_tel, mp.pick_no, mp.id, row_number() over(order by mp.pick_no desc) AS rnum from cafe c, my_pick mp where c.cafe_no = mp.cafe_no and mp.id=#{id}) mpc where rnum between #{pagingBean.startRowNumber} AND #{pagingBean.endRowNumber}
mapper.delete: delete from my_pick where cafe_no=#{cafeNo} and id=#{id}
